Ext.tab.Panel Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.tab.Panel Ext.TabPanel tabpanel tab tabConfig tooltip
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.tab.Panel', {
        width: 400,
        height: 400,
        renderTo: document.body,
        items: [{
            title: 'Foo'
        }, {
            title: 'Bar',
            tabConfig: {
                title: 'Custom Title',
                tooltip: 'A button tooltip'
            }
        }]
    });
});
